keyword: how many calories are in cuties
title: How Many Calories Are in Cuties?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in cuties (one medium clementine), including carbs, fiber, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Cuties?
assumptions: One medium Cuties clementine (~74 g), fresh, peeled and eaten whole, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fruit size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium Cuties clementine provides ~35 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With a sprinkle of cinnamon (negligible calories)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one cutie?
faqs.a: About 35 kcal for one medium Cuties clementine.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in cuties?
faqs.a: One cutie has ~8.9 g carbs, including 1.7 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are cuties low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”0.2 g fat and 0.6 g protein per cutie, mostly water and vitamins.

faqs.q: How does cutie size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller cuties ~25-30 kcal; larger ~40-45 kcal. Average is 35 kcal.

faqs.q: Can I eat cuties for a snack without sodium worries?
faqs.a: Yes, just 1 mg sodium per cutie, making it a low-sodium option.
